cookie.fortune: Nothing's worth doing that's not worth doing right.
Prove to yourself that you can.
And as you wish that others would do to you, so do to them.
Live Free or Die.
'Tis purpose God attends, not prayer.
cookie.cite:
Gilbert of Glockenspur, Dragonheart (Novelization)
by Charles Edward Pogue

cookie.fortune: Stand up straight with your shoulders back.
cookie.cite: Rule 1, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: Treat yourself like someone you are responsible for helping.
cookie.cite: Rule 2, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: Make friends with people who want the best for you.
cookie.cite: Rule 3, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: Compare yourself with who you were yesterday, not with who someone else is today.
cookie.cite: Rule 4, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: Do not let your children do anything that makes you dislike them.
cookie.cite: Rule 5, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: Set your house in perfect order before you criticize the world.
cookie.cite: Rule 6, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: Pursue what is meaningful (not what is expedient).
cookie.cite: Rule 7, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: Tell the truth â€” or, at least, don't lie.
cookie.cite: Rule 8, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: Assume that the person you are listening to might know something you don't.
cookie.cite: Rule 9, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: Be precise in your speech.
cookie.cite: Rule 10, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: Do not bother children when they are skate-boarding.
cookie.cite: Rule 11, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: Pet a cat when you encounter one on the street.
cookie.cite: Rule 12, <cite>12 Rules for Life</cite> by Jordan Peterson

cookie.fortune: I don't think I'd have been in such a hurry to reach adulthood if I'd known the whole thing was going to be ad-libbed.

cookie.fortune: Verbing weirds language.

cookie.fortune: I'd hate to think that all my current experiences will someday become stories with no point.
